data.eml:eml: Ovalidota milleri, a new genus and species of bathyal sea cucumber from the Caribbean Sea (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea: Apodida)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pawson, David L. (2004): Ovalidota milleri, a new genus and species of bathyal sea cucumber from the Caribbean Sea (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea: Apodida). Zootaxa 561: 1-6, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157747
